title: Patterson Lake Cabins
imageAlt: Cabins covered in snow seen from the surface of a frozen lake
text: My family stayed at the Sun Mountain Lodge cabins at Patterson Lake over the long weekend in January. We spent a wonderful time enjoying the winter wonderland. There wasn't much fresh snow, but the lake was completely frozen over allowing for endless fun on ice.

title: Bean in the Sunshine
imageAlt: My cat bean sitting between the curtains and the sunlit window casting an iconic cat shaped shadow.
text: Bean loves basking in the sunlight, even when theres no birds to watch.

title: Ooey Gooey Mushroom
imageAlt: A closeup of a gooey mushroom in a forest
text: During a recent nature walk, I stumbled upon this funky msuhroom.
